Ad Text:
The Company:

Our Client, a leading and rapidly growing Financial Services business is looking to add a data engineer to their growing technology team. This is a unique opportunity to work with some of the best in the industry. You must be to work in-office 5 days per week and be based in Sydney.

The Role:

The data engineer will be part of a dynamic engineering team who are committed to delivering exceptional work. The role is responsible for the design, development, optimisation and maintenance of data infrastructure and pipelines. Working with cross-functional teams, you will be given autonomy to deliver scalable and robust data solutions that enable decision making, ensure optimal performance and operational efficiency.Â 

Key Areas of Responsibility:

Collaborate closely with stakeholders and other developers to understand requirements; design & develop scalable data pipelines.
Optimisation of existing data solutions including the support of systems & bug fixes across a range of Fintech products.
Manage data from multiple sources and consumption of internal/third party APIs.
ETL/ELT
Data code reviews, write documentation, ensuring high data quality and coding best practices.
Your Profile:

A degree in Computer Science or related technical field.
Strong ability to collaborate with stakeholders to understand their business requirements and translate into data solutions within the financial services domain.
Strong experience designing and developing data pipelines, ideally in Fabric.
Good understanding of medallion architecture & dimensional modeling (Kimball) / star schemas.
ETL/ELT.
SQL, PySpark, Snowflake, Fabric, Azure.
Self-starter & proactive, strong communication skills

You must hold Australian Permanent Residency or Citizenship to be considered for this role and be willing to work in the office 5 days per week.

Please apply below.
